body:
Why is this NTR? when this was released Ichigo and Goro weren't even a couple yet, and Zero Two looks like she wanted Hiro and Ichigo to enjoy, later joining the fun. 

Whoever tagged this surely is an idiot.
Unfortunately the most hated genre is one of the most popular here, however even then, there are some great ntr hentai and some extremely shitty that makes people wonder if humanity is a mistake.
No one reads ntr and inserts themselves as the person getting cheated on. Pretty sure they just like seemingly pure girls becoming slutty and the whole moral degeneration / mind break aspect of it.
